title: Work done by various PV cycles

content.description: A monatomic ideal gas is initially in state A, as shown in the PV diagram above. The gas undergoes a transition from state A by the three different processes shown, where process III is isothermal.
content.question: Positive work is performed on the gas in which of the following processes?

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
